name: Thievery Corporation
description: '''Thievery Corporation''' is an American [[electronic music]] duo consisting of Rob Garza and [[Eric Hilton (music producer)|Eric Hilton]]. Their musical style mixes elements of [[Dub music|dub]], [[acid jazz]], [[reggae]], [[Indian classical music|Indian classical]], [[Middle Eastern music]], [[hip hop]], [[electronica]], and [[Brazilian music]], including [[bossa nova]].
